infos.value: I wonder if there's any food...
Is that all you think about?
Baelo, I hate to tell you this, but we're not stopping by.
We must reach Wezette Castle as soon as possible.
Besides, those villagers will get pulled into our war should our pursuers catch up to us.
The pursuing forces from Fennes are drawing near.
No way... They have already caught up to us!?
Damn barbarians... Their legs are as strong as beasts.
Father, let us make haste. At this rate...
Let us go. We shall stop by the village.
We can't do that! If we do that, the village willâ€”!
